data.title: Weathervane Playhouse
data.meta_description: DIGITAL PLAYBILL Musical Comedy - February 23 through March 19, 2023 Music by Alan Menken Lyrics by Glenn Slater Book by Cheri & Bill Steinkellner Additional Material provided by Douglas Carter Beane Based on the Touchstone Pictures Motion Picture, Sister Act, written by Joseph Howard The rousing musical adaptation of the hit 1992 film features original music by the Tony
data.text:
SISTER ACT

Single-Ticket Prices

Special Preview Night Savings for Thursday, Feb. 23 only:

>$29* for adults

>$27.50* for seniors (ages 65 and older)

>$12* for children (ages 17 and younger)

>$15* for college students (with current I.D.)

For Performances AFTER Feb. 23:

>$35* for adults (ages 18 and older)

>$29.50* for seniors (ages 65 and older) on Thursdays and Sundays only

>$12* for children (ages 17 and younger)

>$18* for college students (with current I.D.)

*A $2.00 per-ticket fee will be added to each telephone or in-person sale.

*A $4.00 per-ticket fee will be added to each Internet sale.

Group Discounts

$28 per ticket for groups of 12 to 99

$26 per ticket for groups of 100 or larger

GROUP tickets are NOT available online; please contact the Box Office directly at 330-836-2626.
